org.apache.flink.graph

类 Runner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter.ParameterizedBase
      • org.apache.flink.graph.Runner
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Parameterized

    public class Runner
extends ParameterizedBase
    This default main class executes Flink drivers.

    An execution has one input, one algorithm, and one output. Anything more complex can be expressed as a user program written in a JVM language.

    Inputs and algorithms are decoupled by, respectively, producing and consuming a graph. Currently only Graph is supported but later updates may add support for new graph types such as BipartiteGraph.

    Algorithms must explicitly support each type of output via implementation of interfaces. This is scalable as the number of outputs is small and finite.

      Stores a list of classes for which an instance can be requested by name and implements an iterator over class instances.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        从接口复制的说明: Parameterized
        A unique, human-readable identifier. Presented to the user as the name of a selectable choice.
        指定者:
        getName 在接口中 Parameterized
        覆盖:
        getName 在类中 ParameterizedBase
        返回:
        parameter name

      • getExecutionEnvironment

        public ExecutionEnvironment getExecutionEnvironment()
        Get the ExecutionEnvironment. The ExecutionEnvironment is only available after calling run().
        返回:
        the ExecutionEnvironment

      • getResult

        public DataSet getResult()
        Get the result DataSet. The result is only available after calling run().
        返回:
        the result DataSet

      • getAlgorithmsListing

        private static java.lang.String getAlgorithmsListing()
        List available algorithms. This is displayed to the user when no valid algorithm is given in the program parameterization.
        返回:
        usage string listing available algorithms

      • getAlgorithmUsage

        private static java.lang.String getAlgorithmUsage(java.lang.String algorithmName)
        Display the usage for the given algorithm. This includes options for all compatible inputs, the selected algorithm, and outputs implemented by the selected algorithm.
        参数:
        algorithmName - unique identifier of the selected algorithm
        返回:
        usage string for the given algorithm

      • parameterize

        private void parameterize(Parameterized parameterized)
        Configure a runtime component. Catch RuntimeException and re-throw with a Flink internal exception which is processed by CliFrontend for display to the user.
        参数:
        parameterized - the component to be configured

      • run

        public Runner run()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Setup the Flink job with the graph input, algorithm, and output.

        To then execute the job call execute().

        返回:
        this
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - on error

      • execute

        private void execute()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Execute the Flink job.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - on error

      • writeJobDetails

        private static void writeJobDetails(ExecutionEnvironment env,
                                    java.lang.String jobDetailsPath)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Write the following job details as a JSON encoded file: runtime environment job ID, runtime, parameters, and accumulators.
        参数:
        env - the execution environment
        jobDetailsPath - filesystem path to write job details
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - on error writing to jobDetailsPath
